meanings.definition: A classification or ranking based on a scale of quality or importance.
meanings.sent1: The movie received a high rating from the critics.
meanings.sent2: The hotel has a five-star rating for its exceptional service.
meanings.sent3: I gave my cooking skills a rating of 'master chef'.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness towards others earned her a top rating in my book.
meanings.sent5: The customer feedback survey revealed a low rating for the product's durability.

meanings.definition: An evaluation or assessment of something.
meanings.sent1: The teacher's rating of my essay was very positive.
meanings.sent2: The app store allows users to leave a rating and review.
meanings.sent3: My cat's rating of the new catnip toy was two paws up.
meanings.sent4: The company's environmental rating was through the roof.
meanings.sent5: The restaurant's rating on cleanliness was impeccable.

meanings.definition: The act of assigning a value or score to something.
meanings.sent1: The rating of the exam papers took several hours.
meanings.sent2: The credit agency provides a credit rating for individuals.
meanings.sent3: The dog's rating of the new dog food was a wagging tail.
meanings.sent4: The rating of the artwork was based on creativity and skill.
meanings.sent5: The rating of the performance was displayed on a large screen for all to see.
